gw.api.print

Class PrintSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.print.PrintSettings

  • public class PrintSettings
extends java.lang.Object

    Configuration information to control print output on a per-print basis. PrintSettings are embedded within PrintContexts and various flavors can exist depending on usage. PrintSettings differ from PrintContext in that some of its properties are public and customers are free to configure these values to control their print output, whereas PrintContexts contain mostly internalized data/structs which should never be modified outside of printing mechanisms.

    Control of the base set print settings is done through config.xml.

    NOTE: Most all of these elements need to exposed as public because they are accessed within the print templates. If you decide to make them non-public, please check to make sure your change does not affect any template.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PrintSettings.InternalPrintSettings
      Collection of internal Guidewire print setting configuration properties that should not be used or modified by customers.

      • setOutputFilename

        public void setOutputFilename(java.lang.String filename)
        Sets the name of the file generated. The filename will be processed to ensure it is valid before it is used (illegal characters will be replaced by _). If no value is set by the user, it will default to the configuration parameter PrintDefaultBaseFileName.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the output file. Must not be null or empty

      • setPdfOutputExtension

        public void setPdfOutputExtension(java.lang.String ext)
        Sets the file extension for PDF output files. Defaults to the configuration parameter PrintPdfDefaultBaseFileExtension
        Parameters:
        ext - pdf file extension. Must not be null or empty
